name: Kaarin & Scott
text: Jeremy has been working with Lucy for a few months consistently. She really responds to his method of training!!! She (and we) have all learned so much! So grateful we found him!!

name: Melanie & Brad
text: We're so grateful for Jeremy! We and our dog Shaggy have learned so much thanks to his teaching. He's an incredible trainer and his guidance has been extremely helpful for our entire family.

name: Kelsey
text: We started seeing Jeremy for our one year old golden, Dutton, who was struggling on his leash. After the first session Jeremy gave us great advice in what to practice and within the first couple weeks we saw a huge change in Dutton. We are now able to walk him anywhere without having to dread being pulled around. We continue to see Jeremy for training as we move into basic command training! ❤️

name: Nicole
text: I came to Jeremy with my new puppy Meryl and we worked the program. Beyond teaching the basic skills and obedience he taught me how to teach her. Jeremy always has the answers to all my tiny frustrations and makes it so Meryl and I can just focus on being best friends. We wouldn't be as happy as we are today without his help and I can't recommend him enough.
